scripts.build: spago bundle-module --main Main --to output/screepsMain.js || npm run wrapMain
scripts.wrapMain: cp output/screepsMain.js output/main.js && echo 'module.exports.loop = PS["Main"].main' >> output/main.js
scripts.watch: spago bundle-module --watch --main Main --to output/screepsMain.js --then "npm run wrapMain"
scripts.watch:deploy: spago bundle-module --watch --main Main --to output/screepsMain.js --then "npm run wrapMain && npm run deploy"
scripts.watch:deploy:sim: spago bundle-module --watch --main Main --to output/screepsMain.js --then "npm run wrapMain && npm run deploy:sim"
scripts.watch:deploy:private: spago bundle-module --watch --main Main --to output/screepsMain.js --then "npm run wrapMain && npm run deploy:private"
